title: Frankolala
author: Frankolala
content: Some gamblers keep their gambling activities secrete from people they have close relationship with. Having it in mind that if these people know they are gamblers,it might bring down their reputation or make them look wasteful. I hide my gambling activities from my Mom the reason is that she hates gamblers and calls them irresponsible people from her own perspective.Are you such gambler ?Who are these people you hide your gambling activities from ?Give a reason why you don't want them to know you are a gambler.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: It is commonly said that a man's food can be another man's poison and its true..Personally, to be sincere now, I used to see gamblers as irresponsible people indeed, I used to see them as wasteful people and peeps without a future since to me, it seems they waste lot of money gambling and even when they win, it is never evident in them, I believed all until until I started gambling myself,.And today, I hide my gambling activities from my wife, this is because she's a kind of person that will joy with you when you bring some thing to the table, but when you loose money no matter how small, it becomes a problem for her, she will start reminding you the better thing you would have done with that money.... This is why I keep my gambling activities away from her, and thanks to online casinos that have come and made gambling way more easier,  now I gamble from the comfort of my home, I don't have to go out anymore and be queried like a kid when I don't come back home on time.I also keep my gambling activities from my pastor, and church members, no special reason though but I feel that if my pastors or any member of my church knows I gamble, they might take me unserious and wasteful, just the same way I used to think gamblers are, until I started gambling.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: I hide my gambling activities from my wife the reason is that she told me  gamblers don't care about otger peoples welfare that much because the money gamblers are using to gamble if you ask them for help ,they prefer gambling than helping someone in need at the moment. I have tried to convince her this depends on the individual but she insisted that she has witnessed it twice from different people. I also hide it from my church members I don't know why but I feel it should be a secret in other for them to know am someone that can be relied on in carrying out the church activities with trusting

I think it may affect my professional relationship with them if they know I am a gambler. They may think differently of me if they know I am a gambler, which could lead to affecting my status in my work. I do not hide it from family, loved ones, and friends. I think they are a good source of support if I need them. They can also be a control group if ever I am overdoing my gambling activities.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Frankolala on November 09, 2022, 06:58:21 PMAre you such gambler ?Who are these people you hide your gambling activities from ?Give a reason why you don't want them to know you are a gambler.No, I am not such a gambler. I hide gambling from no one, but there are some people I do not disclose it to because it is not necessary for them to know about it, like my dad and mum. But if they know, I am not concerned and I work for my money myself now.Only what I was thinking before was that I will not let my children know because I think it is not the right thing to do, but I have still not concluded yet if I will let them know or not.

comments.author: madnessteat
comments.body: I think I have the right to privacy, so I don't want anyone else to know that I gamble or buy cryptocurrencies. In my opinion, telling everything about myself to people I know or my relatives is the same as giving them all my passwords.No one knows what will happen tomorrow and how your relationship with the people around you may change, so don't spread information that can be used against you.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: I am just a casual gambler.I hide from everyone, family, friends, peers, as in everyone. I just want to keep it as a secret for now but if someone asks me if I'm one, I will tell the truth but I'm not the same as the others that can't control themselves.Why hide? Because IMO, I am at peace when you gamble without anyone knowing it. And win or loss, there's no need and there's no urge to share it to anybody.
